document_data.caption: A map showing the Shaarwood near the Landrise.
document_data.name: Shaarwood
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shaarwood''' was a small forest found in the western [[Shaar]] near the [[Landrise]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The forest was located along the [[River Shaar]] about halfway between the [[Great Rift]] in the east and the [[Golden Road]] in the west. It was the only forested section of the Shaar for hundreds of miles in any direction.
